articles.title: Wisconsin reports largest 1-day increase of COVID-19 cases - WXOW.com
articles.description: Wisconsin health officials report that 331 tests for the coronavirus have come back positive in the last 24 hours, the largest single-day rise since the outbreak started.
articles.content:
MADISON, Wis (AP/WXOW) - Wisconsin health officials report that 331 tests for the coronavirus have come back positive in the last 24 hours, the largest single-day rise since the outbreak started. 
An additional four people have died.
